Posts.Content: A few weeks after I started to take Tamoxifen I noticed I started to have heartburn, something I have only suffered from when I was pregnant over 24 years ago.  I later started to belch.  My G.P. Prescribed Lansoprazole which has had some good effect but wondered whether others have experienced this.
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen and indigestion.

Posts.Content: Hi grannylara thank you for your reply.  it’s comforting to know other ladies have had the same side effects on tamoxifen My gp has referred me to the gastro team and I’m now awaiting an endoscopy.  It feels like a constant round of tests and more tests and although I am so grateful for all the care I have had I do find them anxiety provoking now.  I’m sure ladies on here understand that.  But Thank you you again for your support and advise and I see my oncologist soon and will also mention it there. Sending love and hugs to you and I hope your treatment goes well.  Take care Phillipa6xxxx
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen and indigestion.

Posts.Content: Thank you G n’ J I’m just llearning how this forum works but I really appreciate your support and advise.   It’s reassuring to know other ladies also have experienced indigestion when taking Tamoxifen.  I will discuss my meds with my doctors as you suggested,   I am also awaiting an endoscopy which I’m not looking forward but I am grateful for all my care I have received from an amazing team of professionals. thanks again take care phillipa6xxxx
